author: Frank Claus
title: Mineralquellen Bad Liebenwerda: Streik für mehr Lohn - die Sicht der Gewerkschaft und der Firma
text:
Mineralquellen Bad Liebenwerda: Streik für mehr Lohn – die Sicht der Gewerkschaft und der Firma
Der Arbeitskampf bei Mineralquellen Bad Liebenwerda verschärft sich. Weiterer Streik nicht ausgeschlossen. Und was ist an den Lieferengpässen dran?
Bad Liebenwerda
Ein Artikel von

author: Sonali Sharma
title: Karnataka temple tax bill fails to pass in Legislative Council amid criticism by BJP
text:
India
The Hindu Religious and Temple Endowments (Amendment) Bill, 2024, was defeated in Karnataka Legislative Council.
The Congress that brought the Hindu Religious Endowment Amendment Bill in the Karnataka Legislative Assembly could not pass the bill despite a 10-minute adjournment due to the lack of strength of the government in the State's Council.
The opposition expressed great displeasure against the Religious Endowment Amendment Bill. Karnataka Minister Ramalinga Reddy bowed to the opposition's pressure and said that he will present the bill again on Monday. But Deputy Chairman of Karnataka Legislative Council Pranesh had objected to this.
The Deputy Speaker said that once a bill has been discussed, it cannot be postponed. The proceedings were adjourned for 10 minutes to discuss and decide.
As the proceedings resumed, Congress inevitably put the Religious Endowment Bill to a vote. A large number of BJP and opposition members participated. Only five members of the ruling party were present. More MLAs voted against the bill in the Assembly. Thus, the bill could not be passed.
As the bill fell, BJP members raised 'Jai Shree Ram' slogans while Congress members shouted 'Bharat Mata Ki Jai'. Meanwhile, after criticisms regarding the Karnataka government's amendments to the Hindu Religious Institutions and Charitable Endowment Bill, ministers Ramalinga Reddy and Dinesh Gundu Rao came in defence of the decision while criticising the opposition, BJP.
Minister for Transport, Ramalinga Reddy alleged that BJP is 'anti-Hindu' adding that the party which was in power in 2011 had made the amendments to the Bill.
Minister for Health, Dinesh Gundu Rao said that the BJP should realise the Bill is for the benefit of the temples. Karnataka Chief Minister Siddaramaiah said that the allegations regarding the amendments to the Bill 'appear to be misrepresented', 'aiming only at misleading the public' and 'polarizing people along communal lines for political leverage.'
The Bill mandates the state to collect 10 percent tax from temples generating revenue exceeding Rs 1 crore and 5 percent from shrines with revenue of between Rs 10 lakh and Rs 1 crore.
(This story has not been edited by DNA staff and is published from ANI)

author: Gary Robbins
title: Counter-protesters peacefully march outside pro-Palestinian encampment at UCSD - The San Diego Union-Tribune
text: The pro-Palestinian encampment that UC San Diego students established last week to protest the war in Gaza drew upward of 200 counterprotesters on Sunday during a tense but peaceful showdown near Geisel Library, participants and university officials said. At least a dozen campus police took positions around the encampment, where the number of tents has risen to more than 50 since the mini-village was created on Wednesday. Police did not attempt to break things up. The ongoing demonstration drew a sharp rebuke Sunday from Chancellor Pradeep Khosla, who said in a public statement that the encampment is "illegal" and has "tripled in size in violation of the group's commitment not to expand the footprint." "The encampment has limited free movement on campus, created a checkpoint for entry into the camp, and denied access to the fire marshal and health inspectors," Khosla said. "As time passes, the threat and potential for violent clashes increases. The presence of a significant number of non-affiliates in the encampment heightens these concerns." The university has said it can get help from other police agencies if it is deemed necessary. Khosla has declined requests from The San Diego Union-Tribune to discuss his interactions with the protesters or to say whether he will forcibly remove them from the encampment. Early Sunday, Los Angeles police cleared an encampment that had been set up at the University of Southern California. And last week, New York City police removed 30 to 40 protesters from inside Columbia University's Hamilton Hall. Sunday's counterdemonstrators included Martha Hoffman of La Jolla, who said the encampment "is just terrible... (The university) should not allow them to chant, 'intifada' " She was standing not far from Hala Abdulah, a pro-Palestinian student who is part of the encampment. "We need our school to understand that we are not leaving," she said, adding that, "We are not going to be relying on UCPD to protect us. No cops, no administration, no one's going to protect us. We will protect ourselves."

author: @zazoomblog
title: Fedez divorzia dalla storica assistente | È stata trattata malissimo
text:
Fedez divorzia dalla storica assistente | È stata trattata malissimo
Chi segue Fedez da anni è stato abituato a vedere nelle storie del rapper una figura che è diventata sempre più familiare: la sua assistente Eleonora Sesana. Sesana in tutti questi anni è sempre rimasta vicina a Federico e lo avrebbe aiutato innumerevoli volte. Proprio a lei, quest'estate, ha.Leggi su Today.it
Today.it - Fedez divorzia dalla storica assistente: "È stata trattata malissimo"
- Fedez divorzia dalla storica assistente: "È stata trattata malissimo"
- Fedez, la rivelazione (scioccante) sul divorzio da Chiara Ferragni: “Una persona me lo ha letto nelle Foglie del Destino”

- Fedez, primo Natale senza Chiara Ferragni e figli. La villa di lusso, le ragazze e l'assenza dell'assistente:
- Fedez e la sua assistente Eleonora hanno fatto pace? L’indiscrezione
- Chiara Ferragni e Fedez si sono lasciati? Cosa sappiamo della presunta crisi dai social
- Chiara Ferragni e Fedez, tutte le tappe della loro storia. Il matrimonio, i due figli, la crisi a Sanremo e l'amante nascosta - Chiara Ferragni e Fedez. Termina così una delle storie d'amore più seguite di sempre, ammirate per la loro "spontaneità" e per l'amore che sembrava ... (leggo.it)
- Fedez e il suo assistente: rivelazioni sorprendenti sulla loro collaborazione - Negli ultimi mesi, la vita di Fedez e Chiara Ferragni è stata al centro di un acceso dibattito, attirando l’attenzione di fan e critici. In questo contesto, Eleonora Sesana, l’assistente personale di ... (velvetgossip.it)
- Ferragni e Fedez: cosa sta succedendo, facciamo il punto della situazione - Podcast, Instagram stories, messaggi privati resi pubblici e tutto quanto c’è da sapere sulla crisi tra l’imprenditrice digitale e il rapper prossimo a Sanremo ... (msn.com)
